text: This is a list of the General Top 20 songs of 2008 in Mexico according to Monitor Latino. Monitor Latino also issued separate year-end charts for Regional Mexican, Pop and Anglo songs. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center" |- ! scope="col" | № ! scope="col" | Title ! scope="col" | Artist(s) |- ! scope="row" | 1 | "Cada que..." || Belanova |- ! scope="row" | 2 | "Perdóname" || La Factoría ft. Eddy Lover |- ! scope="row" | 3 | "Gotas de agua dulce" || Juanes |- ! scope="row" | 4 | "Cinco minutos" || Gloria Trevi |- ! scope="row" | 5 | "Te quiero" || Nigga |- ! scope="row" | 6 | "El tiempo de ti" || Playa Limbo |- ! scope="row" | 7 | "El presente" || Julieta Venegas |- ! scope="row" | 8 | "No te quiero nada" || Ha*Ash |- ! scope="row" | 9 | "¿Dónde están, corazón?" || Enrique Iglesias |- ! scope="row" | 10 | "Para siempre" || Vicente Fernández |- ! scope="row" | 11 | "One, Two, Three, Go!" || Belanova |- ! scope="row" | 12 | "Llegaste tú" || Jesse & Joy |- ! scope="row" | 13 | "Yo quiero" || Camila |- ! scope="row" | 14 | "10 para las 10" || Playa Limbo |- ! scope="row" | 15 | "A labio dulce" || Iskander |- ! scope="row" | 16 | "Inolvidable" || Reik |- ! scope="row" | 17 | "Si no te hubieras ido" || Maná |- ! scope="row" | 18 | "Tú, tú, tú" || La Nueva Banda Timbiriche |- ! scope="row" | 19 | "No se me hace fácil" || Alejandro Fernández |- ! scope="row" | 20 | "Hasta el final" || Alejandra Guzmán |- |} ==See also== *List of number-one songs of 2008 (Mexico) *List of number-one albums of 2008 (Mexico) ==References== Number-one songs Mexico Category:Mexican record charts
title: List of Top 20 songs for 2008 in Mexico
